plot: Nombre Original: PoldarkDirector: Richard LaxronActores: Ioan Gruffudd, John Bowe, Michael Attwell, Mel Martin, Hans MathesonThe year is 1810. Ross Poldark, now a Member of Parliament, is working in London, but the family feud between the Poldarks and the Warleggans still rages. In Cornwall, Demelza is alone with the two children. Jeremy is struggling to keep the mine alive, and daughter Clowance is contemplating her first romance with a mysterious stranger. An epic tale, Poldark is packed with adventure, romance, conflict and the desperate struggle for survival.
title: Poldark
